name: ExportOptionsFlash
shortdesc: Options which may be supplied when exporting a document as an Flash &#40;.SWF) file.

property.name: exportStyle
property.shortdesc: How should the Flash file be created.

property.name: exportVersion
property.shortdesc: Which version of SWF to export.

property.name: frameRate
property.shortdesc: When exporting layers to Flash frames.

property.name: looping
property.shortdesc: Should the Flash file be set to loop when run.

property.name: readOnly
property.shortdesc: Prevent the exported file from being imported by other applications.

property.name: artClipping
property.shortdesc: How should the arts be clipped during the output.

property.name: curveQuality
property.shortdesc: How much curve information should be preserved.

property.name: imageFormat
property.shortdesc: How should the images in the exported Flash file be compressed.

property.name: jpegQuality
property.shortdesc: Level of compression.

property.name: jpegMethod
property.shortdesc: What method to use.

property.name: playbackAccess
property.shortdesc: What access should the SWF file have - local or network access.

property.name: resolution
property.shortdesc: Pixels per inch.

property.name: replacing
property.shortdesc: If a file with the same name already exists, should it be replaced?

property.name: convertTextToOutlines
property.shortdesc: Should all text be converted to outlines.

property.name: compressed
property.shortdesc: Should the exported file be compressed.

property.name: backgroundColor
property.shortdesc: The background color.

property.name: backgroundLayers
property.shortdesc: A list of layers to be included as the static background in all exported Flash frames.

property.name: layerOrder
property.shortdesc: The order in which the layers will be exported to Flash frames.

property.name: blendAnimation
property.shortdesc: Controls how the blend art objects are animated when export to Flash frames.

property.name: ignoreTextKerning
property.shortdesc: Should the kerning information for text objects be ignored.

property.name: exportAllSymbols
property.shortdesc: Should all symbol definitions in the palette be exported to the SWF File.

property.name: preserveAppearance
property.shortdesc: Choose whether to preserve artwork appearance or editability (default) during export.

property.name: includeMetadata
property.shortdesc: If true, include minimal XMP metadata in the exported file.

property.name: saveMultipleArtboards
property.shortdesc: All the artboards or range of the artboards will be exported.

property.name: artboardRange
property.shortdesc: If SaveMultipleArtboards is true,this will be considered for multi-asset extraction which specifies artboard range.Empty string will extracts all the artboards.Default is empty string.
